title: Who are composers who did not write musicals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mozart, Beethoven, Mahler, Ravel, Strauss (Richard and Johann), Schuller, Schmidt, Walton, Hausegger, Humperdinck, Wagner (Richard and Siegfried), Debussy, Paderewski, Glazunov, Britten, Verdi, Atterberg, Nielsen, Franck, Dopper, Copland, Jongen, Schmitt, Korngold, Bartok, Bach (the whole family), Chopin, Szymanowski, Dvorak, Elgar, Bainton, Zappa, Voormolen, Ysaye, Bax, Vaughan-Williams, Peterson-Berger, Gál, Saygun, Bruckner, Frommel, Mendelssohn, Diepenbrock, Boulez, Finzi, Weingartner, Mancini, Zweers, De Boeck, Brahms, Klengel, Kienzle, Rheinberger, Zwaag, Say, Liszt, Fauré, Milhaud, Freitas-Branco, Leifs, Petterson, Wirén, De Frumerie, Shostakovich, Weiner, Karlovicz, Bantock, Vivaldi, Lully, Byrd, Monteverdi, Von Bingen, Palestrina, Reger, Martinu, Huber, Resphigi, Castelnuovo-Tedesco, Cui, Khachaturian, Knussen, Melartin, Harris, Bridge, Van Gilse, Beiderbecke, Zandonai, Boito, Albeniz, Weinberger, Bortkiewicz, Schumann, Haydn, Händel, Alfano, Pizzetti, Malipiero, Casella, Busoni…..
